articles.title: Plant-based diets: What are they, and how do you start? - Medical Xpress
articles.description: As Americans struggle to eat better, plant-based diets have become the rage, but exactly what are those and how hard are they to follow?
articles.content:

articles.title: Connor Bedard ranked top North American skater for the 2023 NHL draft - Sportsnet.ca
articles.description: Regina Pats' centre Connor Bedard is ranked the top North American skater ahead of the 2023 draft in the NHL Central Scouting Bureau's midseason rankings released Friday.
